programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Child
programme.desc: In the hopes of giving her baby a better life, Akça, a hooker, is forced to give up her child, who is taken to be brought up by the wealthy Sule, but the situation changes after the latter has a baby of her own.

programme.title: My Siblings
programme.desc: The events of the series revolve around the life and fate of four siblings after the death of their father, as they are forced to struggle in life and face some obstacles in their way.

programme.title: Secrets of an Angel
programme.desc: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Cennet phones Zeynep, a lawyer. After his death, he leaves a letter, which turns out to be a criminal complaint, upon which the lives of Cennet's children and Yilmaz will never be the same after that day.

programme.title: El Karazoun
programme.desc: A Syrian businessman, Adnan, travels to Beirut and gets exposed to an accident at the port explosion, so he decides to disappear in order to teach his spoiled daughter, Nour, how to be self-reliant and discover the truth around her. However, Karim and Rabee try to seize Nour's wealth.

programme.title: Ahl Al Madina
programme.desc: The series presents a vast panorama of social and economic life and the conflict between those who want to erase the memory of the country so that history begins with them, and those who want to emphasize the continuity of the cultural heritage of the country.

programme.title: Sihr El Sharq
programme.desc: The series revolves around an English lady called Jane Digby,who's deeply fascinated by the East. She marries Sheikh Majool Al - Musallab ,who is a Badawi tribe leader and loves him dearly.

programme.title: Baad Edet Sanawat
programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.title: Forsa Akhera
programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

programme.desc: The series presents a vast panorama of social and economic life and the conflict between those who want to erase the memory of the country so that history begins with them, and those who want to emphasize the continuity of the cultural heritage of the country.

programme.title: Bbsata 2
programme.desc: A collection of sketches discussing social and global issues like marriage, power, work, and future in a satirical way.

programme.title: Harret El Qubba 3

programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2019 A young businessman falls in love with a female singer, but his mother doesn't accept their relationship and tries to separate them by all means. Dhaffer Alabedin, Karmen Bsebas, Takla Chamoun, Joe Torad, Mohamed Al-Ahmed, Imra Kabakusak, Nadine Gaber

programme.title: Nasl El Aghrab
programme.desc: In the wake of a fight that left half the members of Ghefran and Assaf's families dead, the latter is released from prison to try and restore the balance of power between him and his archenemy Gherfan, especially as the latter had married Assaf's beloved ex-wife and raised his son.

programme.title: Without Restraint (Ep21)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2021 Ghazal is trapped in an unwanted marriage to a controlling businessman due to his power and her family's passiveness. However, everything changes when her heart and Seif El Khedewy's heart are united by fearless love. Yasmin Abd Al Aziz, Ahmed Al Awady, Khaled Al Sawy, Dina Fouaad, Khaled Sarhan, Amr Mahmoud Yasin, Mustafa Fikry

programme.title: Bab Al-Hara 3
programme.desc: The tale of the revolutionary struggles of the people continues. The neighborhood is shocked by Abu Issam's sudden departure. A new doctor, Ibn Al-Baghgaty, arrives in the neighborhood, showing his skill in treating incurable diseases.

programme.title: Gharib's Home (Ep5)
programme.desc: Drama, People 2021 A man's life changes after his wife's death and faces several challenges while he is trying to provide a good life for his family, he also helps others to improve their lives. Abd Al Mohsen Al Nemr, Gamaan El Rowiei, Abdullah Boshehry, Mais Kumar , Abdelmohsen Elkaffas, Hussein Al Heleiby, Hussain Al Mahdy

programme.title: My Name Is Farah
programme.desc: Farah fled Iran and is now employed illegally as a cleaner in Istanbul. Her life is turned upside down when she witnesses a murder at work, preventing her from traveling to France to care for her ill son. She then makes an attempt to flee from the criminals after they identify her.

programme.title: Badr's Will (Ep13)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2020 Highlighting the nature of family relationships between parents and their offspring. Mohamed Al Towyan, Laila Alslman, Mohannad Al Hamdi, Jacob Farhan, Sara Al Yafyi, Sally Zack, Dae Al Hilali, Khalid Al Refaey, Hani Sarhan

programme.title: She Looks Great (Ep1)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance, Bollywood 2021 Priya lives in her family home with her mother and sisters. She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Jyoti Tiwari, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Elle Maloush Kbeer
programme.desc: As Ghazal's father forces her to marry a wealthy businessman despite the big age difference between them, the circumstances force her to toughen up in order to deal with those around her, as she gets to know the young man Seif El Khedewy and falls for him.

programme.title: Progeny Of Al Aghrab (Ep21)
programme.desc: Drama, People, Thriller 2021 Presenting the story of a man from upper Egypt who is accused of murder; after spending jail time, he returns to revenge from his worst enemies. Amir Karara, Ahmed El Sakka, Mai Omar, Ahmed Malek, Ahmad Dash, Mohamed Samy, Mohamed Samy

programme.title: Dar Gharib
programme.desc: As Gharib fights everyone to marry Asmaa, they have two daughters, Salwa and Nada. He lives peacefully with his family, until things take a turn following his wife’s death and his daughter Nada's marriage without his knowledge, while he loses all his money.

programme.title: Bab Al Hara (Ep4)
programme.desc: Drama, People 2008 Last century, during the French occupation, a Syrian neighborhood defending their culture, values and traditions against the enemy. Samer Almasry, Sabah Al Jazaaery, Wafaa Mousilly, Huda Sharawy, Wafeeq Al Zaeem, Bassam Al Molla, Marwan Kawouk

programme.title: Wasiyat Badr
programme.desc: The events explore the relationship between fathers and sons, through the story of Badr, who leaves a will that must be executed so that his children have their huge inheritance. But it separates them in life for a year before they can get the inheritance, as each one of them starts from scratch.

programme.title: Be My Sunshine (Ep75)
programme.desc: Comedy, Romance 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. Without knowing, she ruins his work. Ayca Aysin Turan, Alp Navruz, Nihan Büyükagaç, Ipek Tenolcay, Bülent Çolak, Ali Bilgin, Özgür Sevimli, Aksel Bonfil, Yesim Citak, Yelda Eroglu, Dilek Iyigün, Emine Yildirim

programme.title: Bade Achhe Lagte Hain 2
programme.desc: Priya and Ram are two people from different worlds. As circumstances bring them together, they get married, and over time, their bond gets stronger as they fall in love.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. Khalil refuses to hand over the land to the heirs and clashes with Harbi's son, Mohamed, who loves Khalil's daughter.

programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: Flight of Dreams
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab, however, as the family dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Bab Al-Reih
programme.desc: Addressing the issue of the widespread violence that has taken over society, the series tells the story of a mailman who struggles with the fact that written mail is no longer being used, as he balances his professional struggles with the love he has for his family, especially his blind daughter.

programme.title: Bayn qalbayn
programme.desc: A romantic social drama that deals with the love story of the girl Ariam, who defended her love against the tough conditions she's living in at the time. She fell in love with Bashar despite being married to another.

programme.title: Nasibi Wa Qesmetik
programme.desc: Connected but separate episodes dealing with 15 different topics, divided into 3 episodes each topic, discussing the relationship between men and women, the problems that occur between them, and how they can be overcome.

programme.title: Timpo

programme.title: Jambori
programme.desc: Ymunwch â Jam ar daith llawn synau, cerddoriaeth a lluniau lliwgar - gyda hwyaid yn dawnsio yn y bath, drws hudol yn y parc a chath yn coginio cacen. Welcome to a new series of Jamborî.

programme.title: Sam Tan
programme.desc: Gem ffon yw Hela Pryfed Estron. Mae Norman, Mandy, Sara a Jams yn mwynhau chwarae, efo cystadleuaeth daer rhyngddyn nhw a Siarlys a Meic Flood. The gang play the Alien Bug Hunt phone game.

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae dwr yr harbwr wedi troi'n wyrdd dros nos. Tybed beth yw e a sut y gwnaiff yr Harbwr Feistr cael gwared ohono? The harbour water has turned green overnight. What is causing this?

programme.title: Sbarc
programme.desc: Cyfres wyddoniaeth gyda Tudur Phillips a'i ddau ffrind, Sbarc y gwyddonydd a Nef y Ditectif Natur. Pre-school science series with Tudur Phillips and his two friends. Today's theme is birds.

programme.title: New: Blociau Lliw
programme.desc: Mae'r Blociau Lliw yn dod at ei gilydd. Faint ohonyn nhw ydych chi'n eu cofio? All the Colourblocks come together. How many do you remember?

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
programme.desc: Pan fydd Crawc yn penderfynu gwersylla ar lan yr afon, mae'r gwencïod yn achub ar y cyfle i gymryd drosodd y Crawcdy. The weasels grab an opportunity to take over Toad Hall. Poor Toad!

programme.title: Bendibwmbwls
programme.desc: Cyfres gomedi, celf a chân i blant 4-7 mlwydd oed lle mae Aeron Pugh fel y cymeriad Bendant yn ymuno â dosbarthiadau plant ledled Cymru. Comedy, art and singing series for children aged 4-7.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fo'r haul yn diflannu, mae Blero a'i ffrindiau'n gwibio i'r gofod i weld beth sy'n digwydd. When the sun mysteriously disappears Blero and his friends zoom up to space to solve things.

programme.title: New: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw a chriw o ffrindiau yn adeiladu rafft, ac fe gawn ni gwrdd a Hetti a'i cheffyl, Bunny. Today, Meleri will be meeting Megan and a lot of pigeons!

programme.title: Cywion Bach
programme.desc: Heddiw, mae ffrindiau'r Cywion Bach yn dangos gair arbennig - haul! Today, the friends of Cywion Bach are showing a special word - haul. Bîp Bîp goes to the beach to play in the sun.

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
programme.desc: Beth sy'n digwydd ym myd Shwshaswyn heddiw? What's happening in the world of Shwshaswyn today?

programme.title: Digbi Draig

programme.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
programme.desc: Mae Llew wedi cau'r caffi a mynd i'r jyngl i weld ei ffrindiau ond mae wedi drysu'r diwrnodau! Llew closes the café and sets off to the jungle to meet his friends but he's got the day wrong.

programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.desc: Ar yr antur popwych heddiw mae gan Twm wisg ditectif newydd ac mae'n benderfynol o ddatrys dirgelion! Today, Twm has a new detective costume and he's ready to solve some mysteries!

programme.title: Nos Da Cyw
programme.desc: Sh! Mae'r haul yn mynd i'w wely ac mae'n amser i ni gael stori fach cyn cysgu. Shh! The sun is going to bed so let's have a lovely little bedtime story.

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae gair newydd heddiw, 'brwsh dannedd' yn rhywbeth a ddefnyddir i'ch cadw'n lân. Today's word, 'toothbrush' is used to keep you clean. Who will be chosen to look for it?

programme.title: Y Diwrnod Mawr
programme.desc: Mae Owen wedi arfer ennill rasus ar ei cwad, ond eleni mae 'na sialens! A fydd o'n llwyddo i gael un o dri safle ar y podiwm? Owen's used to winning quad races, but fingers crossed anyway...

programme.title: Guto Gwningen

programme.title: Llan-ar-goll-en

programme.desc: Mae edrych ar ol wy yn un o'r petha mwya pwysig all ddewryn bach ddysgu, ond mae'n well gan Odo chwara pel-droed! Caring for an egg is so important to birds but Odo would rather play footie!

programme.title: Stiw

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau

programme.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd â Caradog y ceiliog a Marged a'i chwningen. Today we meet Caradog the cockerel and Marged and her rabbit.

programme.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
programme.desc: Anturiaethau Tomos a'i ffrindiau. The adventures of Tomos and friends.

programme.title: Byd Tad-cu

programme.desc: Ar ôl clywed synau rhyfedd a gweld olion troed mawr yn yr ardd, mae Cyw, Plwmp a Deryn yn credu bod dinosor wedi bod yno. Cyw, Plwmp and Deryn believe that a dinosaur has been in the garden!

programme.title: Cymylaubychain

programme.title: Shwshaswyn
